name: Noise gate
description:
This algorithm is a multi-channel noise gate. Each channel is fully independent – this being a multichannel algorithm is simply a convenience so that if you want a noise gate on all 12 module inputs, you don’t need to add 12 copies of the algorithm to do so.

A sidechain input is available, to gate one signal with another. The algorithm always works as an insert effect i.e. the output replaces the input.

input_ports.name: Left/mono input
input_ports.description: The left or mono input bus for the channel.

input_ports.name: Right input
input_ports.description: The right input bus, if stereo.

input_ports.name: Sidechain input
input_ports.description: The sidechain input bus to control gate opening/closing.

output_ports.name: Output
output_ports.description: The processed signal output (replaces the original input when used as an insert effect).
